# SMM DEPARTMENT STRATEGY REPORT**Date:** 2025-11-26**Meeting Type:** Admin SMM Discussion**Participants:** Nikolay (Kolya), Katya, Dasha, Nastya (mentioned)**Department:** Social Media Marketing (SMM)**Report Generated:** Using MAIN_PROMPT v7.0---## EXECUTIVE SUMMARYStrategic discussion about launching company-wide SMM initiative. Key decision: **Everyone must do SMM**, not a dedicated team. Focus on building follower base through educational content before recruiting/sales messaging. Immediate priority: verify account access and get first posts live.---## STRATEGIC VISION### Core Philosophy: "Funnel Marketing"> "Marketing is built on understanding the concept of 'funnel'. You can't immediately say 'I want to sleep with you'.
